original: AnTs_1ab nidhāya hṛdi viśveśaṃ vidhāya guruvandanam /
analyzed: nidhāya hṛdi viśveśam vidhāya guru vandanam
bālānām sukha bodhāya kriyate tarka saṃgrahaḥ
dravya guṇa karma sāmānya viśeṣa samavāya abhāvāḥ sapta padārthāḥ
tatra dravyāṇi pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāyu ākāśa kāla diś ātma manāṃsi nava eva
rūpa rasa gandha sparśa saṃkhyā parimāṇa pṛthaktva saṃyoga vibhāga para tva apara tva guru tva drava tva sneha śabda buddhi sukha duḥkha icchā dveṣa prayatna dharma adharma saṃskārāḥ
caturviṃśati guṇāḥ
utkṣepaṇa avakṣepaṇa ākuñcana prasāraṇa gamanāni pañca karmāṇi

original: AnTs_6 param aparaṃ ceti dvividhaṃ sāmānyam //
analyzed: param aparam ca iti dvividham sāmānyam

original: AnTs_7 nityadravyavṛttayo viśeṣās tv anantā eva //
analyzed: nitya dravya vṛttayaḥ viśeṣāḥ tu anantāḥ eva
ants samavāyaḥ tu ekaḥ eva
ants abhāvaḥ caturvidhaḥ
prāgabhāvaḥ tyanta abhāvaḥ nyonya abhāvaḥ ca iti
gandhavatī pṛthivī
sā dvividhā nityā anityā ca
nityā paramāṇu rūpā
anityā kārya rūpā
punar trividhā śarīra indriya viṣaya bhedāt
śarīram asmat ādīnām
indriyam gandha grāhakam ghrāṇam nāsā agra varti
viṣayaḥ mṛd pāṣāṇa ādiḥ
śita sparśavatyaḥ āpaḥ
tāḥ dvividhāḥ nityāḥ anityāḥ ca
ntyāḥ paramāṇu rūpāḥ
anityāḥ kārya rūpāḥ
punar trividhāḥ śarīra indriya viṣaya bhedāt
śarīram varuṇa loke
indriyam rasa grāhakam rasanam jihvā agra varti
viṣayaḥ sarit samudra ādiḥ
uṣṇa sparśavat tejaḥ
tat dvividham nityam anityam ca
paramāṇu rūpam
anityam kārya rūpam
punar trividham śarīra indriya viṣaya bhedāt
śarīram āditya loke
indriyam rūpa grāhakam cakṣuḥ kṛṣṇa tārā agra varti
viṣayaḥ caturvidhaḥ
bhauma divya audarya ākara ja bhedāt
bhaumam vahni ādikam
abindhanam divyam vidyut ādi
bhuktasya pariṇāma hetuḥ audaryam ākara jam suvarṇa ādi
rūpa rahita sparśavān vāyuḥ
sa dvividhaḥ nityaḥ nityaḥ ca
nityaḥ paramāṇu rūpaḥ
anityaḥ kārya rūpaḥ
punar trividhaḥ śarīra indriya viṣaya bhedāt
śarīram vāyu loke
indriyam sparśa grāhakam tvac sarva śarīra varti
viṣayaḥ vṛkṣa ādi kampana hetuḥ
śarīra antar saṃcārī vāyuḥ prāṇaḥ
sa ca ekaḥ pi upādhi bhedāt prāṇa apāna ādi saṃjñāḥ labhate
śabda guṇam ākāśam
tat ca ekam vibhu nityam ca
sa ca ekaḥ vibhuḥ nityaḥ ca
sā ca ekā vibhvī nityā ca
jñāna adhikaraṇam ātmā
sa dvividhaḥ paramātmā jīvātmā ca
tatra īśvaraḥ sarvajñaḥ paramātmā ekaḥ eva

original: jīvātmā pratiśarīraṃ bhinno vibhur nityaś ca //
analyzed: jīvātmā pratiśarīram bhinnaḥ vibhuḥ nityaḥ ca

original: tac ca pratyātmaniyatatvād anantaṃ paramāṇurūpaṃ nityaṃ ca //
analyzed: tat ca pratyātma niyata tvāt anantam paramāṇu rūpam nityam ca
cakṣuḥ mātra grāhyaḥ guṇaḥ rūpam
tat ca śukla nīla pīta rakta harita kapiśa citra bhedāt saptavidham pṛthivī jala tejaḥ vṛtti
tatra pṛthivyām saptavidham
abhāsvara śuklam jale
bhāsvara śuklam tejasi
sa ca madhura amla lavaṇa kaṭu kaṣāya tikta bhedāt ṣaḍvidhaḥ
pṛthivyām ṣaḍvidhaḥ
jale madhuraḥ eva
ghrāṇa grāhyaḥ guṇaḥ gandhaḥ
sa ca dvividhaḥ surabhiḥ asurabhiḥ ca
tvac indriya mātra grāhyaḥ guṇaḥ sa parśaḥ
sa ca trividhaḥ śita uṣṇa anuṣṇa aśīta bhedāt
tatra śītaḥ jale
uṣṇaḥ tejasi
an uṣṇa aśītaḥ pṛthivī vāyvoḥ

original: AnTs_23 rūpādicatuṣṭayaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pākajam anityaṃ ca /
analyzed: rūpa ādi catuṣṭayam pṛthivyām pāka jam anityam ca
anyatra apāka jam nityam antyam ca
nitya gatam nityam
anitya gatam anityam
eka tva ādi vyavahāra hetuḥ saṃkhyā
eka tvam nityam anityam ca
nitya gatam nityam anitya gatam anityam
dvi tva ādikam tu sarvatra anityam eva
māna vyavahāra kāraṇam parimāṇam
nava dravya vṛtti
tat caturvidham
aṇu mahat dīrgham hrasvam ca iti
sarva dravya vṛtti
saṃyukta vyavahāra hetuḥ saṃyogaḥ
sarva dravya vṛttiḥ
saṃyoga nāśakaḥ guṇaḥ vibhāgaḥ
sarva dravya vṛttiḥ
pṛthivī ādi catuṣṭaya manaḥ vṛtti iti
te dvividhe diś kṛte kāla kṛte ca
dūra sthe diś kṛtam para tvam
samīpa sthe diś kṛtam apara tvam
jyeṣṭhe kālakṛtham paratvam
kaniṣṭhe kāla kṛtam aparatvam
ādya patana asamavāyi kāraṇam guru tvam
ādya syandana asamavāyi kāraṇam drava tvam pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vṛtti
tat dvividham sāṃsiddhikam naimittikam ca
sāṃsiddhikam jale naimittikam pṛthivī tejasoḥ
tejasi suvarṇa ādau
śrotra grāhyaḥ guṇaḥ śabdaḥ
ākāśa mātra vṛttiḥ
sa dvividhaḥ dvanya ātmakaḥ varṇa ātmakaḥ ca iti
dvanya ātmakaḥ bherī ādau
varṇa ātmakaḥ saṃskṛta bhāṣā ādi rūpaḥ
sarva vyavahāra hetuḥ buddhiḥ jñānam
sā dvividhā smṛtiḥ anubhavaḥ ca
tad bhinnam jñānam anubhavaḥ
sa dvividhaḥ yathārthaḥ yathārthaḥ ca
tadvati tad prakārakaḥ nubhavaḥ yathā arthaḥ

original: yathā rajata idaṃ rajatam iti jñānam /
analyzed: yathā rajate idam rajatam iti jñānam
saḥ eva pramā iti ucyate
tad abhāvavati tad prakārakaḥ nubhavaḥ yathārthaḥ

original: yathā śuktāv idaṃ rajatam iti jñānam //
analyzed: yathā śuktau idam rajatam iti jñānam
tad karaṇam api caturvidham pratyakṣa anumāna upamāna śabda bhedāt
asādhāraṇam kāraṇam karaṇam
kāraṇam trividham samavāyi asamavāyi nimitta bhedāt

original: yat samavetaṃ kāryam utpadyate tat samavāyikāraṇam /
analyzed: yat samavetam kāryam utpadyate tat samavāyi kāraṇam

original: yathā tantavaḥ paṭasya paṭaś ca khagatarūpādeḥ /
analyzed: yathā tantavaḥ paṭasya paṭaḥ ca kha gata rūpa ādeḥ

original: kāryeṇa kāraṇena vā sahaikasminn arthe samavetatve sati yat kāraṇaṃ tad asamavāyikāraṇam /
analyzed: kāryeṇa kāraṇena vā saha ekasmin arthe samaveta tve sati yat kāraṇam tat asamavāyikāraṇam
yathā tantu saṃyogaḥ paṭasya tantu rūpam paṭa rūpasya
tad ubhaya bhinnam kāraṇam nimitta kāraṇam
yathā turī vema ādikam paṭasya

original: AnTs_41 tad etattrividhakāraṇamadhye yad asādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ tad eva karaṇam //
analyzed: tat etat trividha kāraṇa madhye yat asādhāraṇam kāraṇam tat eva karaṇam
tatra pratyakṣa jñāna karaṇam pratyakṣam
indriya artha sannikarṣa janyam jñānam pratyakṣam
tat dvividham nirvikalpakam savikalpakam ca iti

original: tatra nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ yathedaṃ kiṃcit /
analyzed: tatra nirvikalpakam jñānam nirvikalpakam yathā idam kiṃcid

original: saparakārakaṃ jñānaṃ savikalpakaṃ yathā ḍittho'yam brahmaṇo'yaṃ śyāmo'yam iti //
analyzed: sa para kārakam jñānam sa vikalpakam yathā iti

original: saṃyogaḥ saṃyuktasamavāyaḥ saṃyuktasamavetasamavāyaḥ samavāyaḥ samavetasamavāyo viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaś ceti /
analyzed: saṃyogaḥ saṃyukta samavāyaḥ saṃyukta samaveta samavāyaḥ samavāyaḥ samaveta samavāyaḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ ca iti
cakṣuṣā ghaṭa pratyakṣa janane saṃyogaḥ sannikarṣaḥ

original: ghaṭarūpapratyakṣajanane saṃyuktasamavāyaḥ sannikarṣaḥ cakṣuḥsaṃyukte ghaṭe rūpasya samavāyāt /
analyzed: ghaṭa rūpa pratyakṣa janane saṃyukta samavāyaḥ sannikarṣaḥ cakṣuḥ saṃyukte ghaṭe rūpasya samavāyāt

original: rūpatvasāmānyapratyakṣe saṃyuktasamavetasamavāyaḥ sannikarṣaḥ cakṣuḥsaṃyukte ghaṭe rūpaṃ samavetaṃ tatra rūpatvasya samavāyāt /
analyzed: rūpa tva sāmānya pratyakṣe saṃyukta samaveta samavāyaḥ sannikarṣaḥ cakṣuḥ saṃyukte ghaṭe rūpam samavetam tatra rūpa tvasya samavāyāt
śrotreṇa śabdasya ākāśa guṇa tvāt guṇa guṇinoḥ ca samavāyāt

original: śabdatvasākṣātkāre samavetasamavāyaḥ sannikarṣaḥ śrotrasamavete śabde śabdatvasya samavāyāt /
analyzed: śabda tva sākṣātkāre samaveta samavāyaḥ sannikarṣaḥ śrotra samavete śabde śabda tvasya samavāyāt
abhāva para tyakṣe viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ sannikarṣaḥ ghaṭa abhāva vat

original: bhṛtalam ity atra cakṣuḥsaṃyukte bhūtale ghaṭābhāvasya viśeṣaṇatvāt /
analyzed: bhṛ talam iti atra cakṣuḥ saṃyukte bhū tale ghaṭa abhāvasya viśeṣaṇa tvāt
evam snnikarṣa ṣaṭka janyam jñānam pratyakṣam
tad karaṇam indriyam
tasmāt indriyam pratyakṣa pramāṇam iti siddham
anumiti karaṇam anumānam
vyāpti viśiṣṭa pakṣa dharma tā jñānam parāmarśaḥ

original: yathā vahnivyāpyadhūmavān ayaṃ parvata iti jñānaṃ parāmarśaḥ /
analyzed: yathā vahni vyāpya dhūmavān ayam parvataḥ iti jñānam parāmarśaḥ

original: taj janyaṃ parvato vahnimān iti jñānam anumitiḥ /
analyzed: tat janyam parvataḥ vahnimān iti jñānam anumitiḥ

original: yatra yatra dhūmas tatrāgnir iti sāhacaryaniyamo vyāptiḥ /
analyzed: yatra yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ iti sāhacarya niyamaḥ vyāptiḥ
vyāpyasya parvata ādi vṛtti tvam pakṣa dharma tā

original: AnTs_45 anumānaṃ dvividhaṃ svārthaṃ parārthaṃ ca /
analyzed: anumānam dvividham sva artham para artham ca
tatra sva artham sva anumiti hetuḥ

original: tathā hi svayam eva bhūyo darśanena yatra dhūmas tatra agnir iti mahānasādau vyāptiṃ
analyzed: tathā hi svayam eva bhūyas darśanena yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ iti mahānasa ādau vyāptim

original: gṛhītvā parvatasamīpaṃ gatas tadgate cāgnau sandihānaḥ parvate dhūmaṃ paśyan vyāptiṃ
analyzed: gṛhītvā parvata samīpam gataḥ tad gate ca agnau sandihānaḥ parvate dhūmam paśyan vyāptim
smarati yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ iti

original: tadantaraṃ vahnivyāpyadhūmavān ayaṃ parvata iti jñānam utpadyate /
analyzed: tad antaram vahni vyāpya dhūmavān ayam parvataḥ iti jñānam utpadyate
ayam eva liṅga parāmarṣam iti ucyate

original: tasmāt parvato vahnimān iti jñānam anumitir utpadyate /
analyzed: tasmāt parvataḥ vahnimān iti jñānam anumitiḥ utpadyate
tat etat sva artha anumānam

original: yat tu svayaṃ dhūmād agnim anumāya parapratipattyarthaṃ pañcāvayavavākyaṃ prayukte tat parārthānumānam /
analyzed: yat tu svayam dhūmāt agnim anumāya para pratipatti artham pañca avayava vākyam prayukte tat para artha anumānam
yathā parvataḥ vahnimān dhūmavat tvāt

original: yo yo dhūmavān sa vahnimān yathā mahānasaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ dhūmavān sa vahnimān yathā mahānasaḥ
tathā ca ayam
tasmāt tathā iti

original: anena pratipāditāl lingāt paro'py agniṃ pratipadyate //
analyzed: anena pratipāditāt lingāt parā upi agnim pratipadyate
pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanaya nigamāni pañca avayavaḥ
parvataḥ vahnimān iti pratijñā
dhūmavat tvāt iti hetuḥ

original: yo yo dhūmavān sa so'gnimān yathā mahānasa ity udāharaṇam /
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ dhūmavān sa sa agnimān yathā mahānasaḥ iti udāharaṇam
tathā ca ayam iti upanayaḥ
tasmāt tathā iti nigamanam
sva artha anumiti para artha anumityoḥ liṅga parāmarśaḥ eva karaṇam
tasmāt liṅga parāmarśa anumānam
anvaya vyatireki kevala anvayi kevala vyatireki ca iti
anvayena vyatirekeṇa ca vyāptimat anvaya vyatireki
yathā vahnau sādhye dhūmavat tvam

original: yatra dhūmas tatrāgnir yathā mahānasa ity anvayavyāptiḥ /
analyzed: yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ yathā mahānase iti anvaya vyāptiḥ

original: yatra vahnir nāsti tatra dhūmo'pi nāsti yathā mahāhrada iti vyatirekavyāptiḥ /
analyzed: yatra vahniḥ na asti tatra dhūmaḥ api na asti yathā mahā hradaḥ iti vyatireka vyāptiḥ

original: anvayamātravyāptikaṃ kevalānvayi yathā ghaṭo'bhidheyaḥ prameyatvāt paṭavat /
analyzed: anvaya mātra vyāptikam kevala anvayi yathā ghaṭaḥ abhidheyaḥ prameya tvāt paṭa vat

original: atra prameyatvābhidhyatvayor vyatirekavyāptir nāsti sarvasyāpi prameyatvād abhidheyatvāc ca /
analyzed: atra prameya tva abhidhya tvayoḥ vyatireka vyāptiḥ nā asti sarvasya api prameya tvāt abhidheya tvāt ca

original: vyatirekamātravyāptikaṃ kevalavyatireki yathā pṛthivī tarebhyo bhidyate gandhavattvāt /
analyzed: vyatireka mātra vyāptikam kevala vyatireki yathā pṛthivī tarebhyaḥ bhidyate gandhavat tvāt

original: yad itarebhyo na bhidyate na tad gandhavat /
analyzed: yat itarebhyaḥ na bhidyate na tat gandhavat
yathā jalam
na ca iyam tathā

original: tasmān na tatheti atra yad gandhavat tad itarabhinnam ity anvayadṛṣṭanto nāsti pṛthivīmātrasya pakṣatvāt //
analyzed: tasmāt na tathā iti atra yat gandhavat tat itara bhinnam iti anvaya dṛṣṭantaḥ na asti pṛthivī mātrasya pakṣa tvāt
saṃdigdha sādhyavān pakṣaḥ
yathā dhūmavat tve hetau parvataḥ
niścita sādhyavān sapakṣaḥ
yathā tatra eva mahānasaḥ
niścita sādhya abhāvavān vipakṣaḥ
yathā tatra eva mahā hradaḥ
savyabhicāra viruddha sat pakṣa asiddha bādhitāḥ pañca hetvābhāsāḥ
sa vyabhicāraḥ na aikāntikaḥ
sa trividhaḥ
sādhāraṇa asādhāraṇa anupasaṃhāri bhedāt
tatra sādhya abhāvavat vṛttiḥ sādhāraṇaḥ anaikāntikaḥ

original: yathā parvato vahnimān prameyatvād iti prameyatvasya vahnyabhāvavati hrade vidyamānatvāt /
analyzed: yathā parvataḥ vahnimān prameya tvāt iti prameya tvasya vahni abhāvavati hrade vidyamāna tvāt
sarva sapakṣa vipakṣa vyāvṛttaḥ usādhāraṇaḥ
yathā śabdaḥ nityaḥ śabda tvāt iti

original: śabdatvaṃ sarvebhyo nityebhyo'ntyebhyaś ca vyāvṛttaṃ śabdamātravṛtti /
analyzed: śabda tvam sarvebhyaḥ nityebhyaḥ antyebhyaḥ ca vyāvṛttam śabda mātra vṛtti
anvaya vyatireka dṛṣṭānta rahitaḥ nupasaṃhārī
yathā sarvam anityam prameya tvāt iti
atra sarvasya api pakṣa tvāt dṛṣṭāntaḥ na asti
sādhya abhāva vyāptaḥ hetuḥ viruddhaḥ
yatra śabdaḥ nityaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti
kṛtaka tvam hi nitya tva abhāvena anitya tvena vyāptam

original: AnTs_55 yasya sādhyabhāvasādhakaṃ hetvantaraṃ vidyate sa satpratipakṣaḥ /
analyzed: yasya sādhya bhāva sādhakam hetvantaram vidyate sa sat pratipakṣaḥ

original: yathā śabdo nityaḥ śrāvaṇatvāc chabdatvavad iti /
analyzed: yathā śabdaḥ nityaḥ śrāvaṇa tvāt śabda tva vat iti
śabdaḥ nityaḥ kārya tvāt ghaṭa vat iti
āśraya asiddhaḥ svarūpa asiddhaḥ vyāpya tva asiddhaḥ ca iti

original: āśrayāsiddho yathā gaganāravindaṃ surabhy aravindatvāt sarojāravindavat /
analyzed: āśraya asiddhaḥ yathā gagana aravindam surabhi aravinda tvāt saroja aravinda vat
atra gagana aravindam āśrayaḥ
sa ca na asti eva
svarūpa asiddhaḥ yathā śabdaḥ guṇaḥ cākṣuṣa tvāt

original: atra cākṣuṣatvaṃ śabde nāsti śabdasya śrāvaṇatvāt /
analyzed: atra cākṣuṣa tvam śabde na asti śabdasya śrāvaṇa tvāt
sa upādhikaḥ vyāpya tva asiddhaḥ
sādhya vyāpaka tve sati sādhana avyāpakaḥ upādhiḥ
sādhya samāna adhikaraṇa atyanta abhāva apratiyogi tvam sādhya vyāpaka tvam

original: parvato dhūmavān vahnimattvād ity atrārdrendhasaṃyoga upādhiḥ /
analyzed: parvataḥ dhūmavān vahnimat tvāt iti atra ārdra indha saṃyogaḥ upādhiḥ
tathā hi
yatra dhūmaḥ tatra ārdra indhna saṃyogaḥ iti sādhya vyāpaka tā
yatra vahniḥ tatra ārdra indhana saṃyoga abhāvāt iti sādhana avyāpaka tā
evam sādhya vyāpaka tve
sati sādhana avyāpaka tvāt ardra indhana saṃyogaḥ upādhiḥ
sa upādhika tvāt vahnimat tvam vyāpya tva asiddham

original: AnTs_57 yasya sādhyābhāvaḥ pramāṇāntareṇa niścitaḥ sa bādhitaḥ /
analyzed: yasya sādhya abhāvaḥ pramāṇa antareṇa niścitaḥ sa bādhitaḥ
yathā vahniḥ anuṣṇaḥ dravya tvāt iti

original: atrānuṣṇatvaṃ sādhyaṃ tadabhāva uṣṇatvaṃ spārśanapratyakṣeṇa gṛhyata iti bādhitatvam //
analyzed: atra anuṣṇa tvam sādhyam tad abhāve uṣṇa tvam spārśana pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyate iti bādhita tvam
upamiti karaṇam upamānam
saṃjñā saṃjñi saṃbandha jñānam upamitiḥ
tad karaṇam sādṛśya jñānam
atideśa vākya artha smaraṇam avāntara vyāpāraḥ

original: tathā hi kaś cid gavayaśabdārtham ajānan kutaś cid āraṇyakapuruṣād gosadṛśo gavaya iti śrutvā vanaṃ gato vākyārthaṃ smaran gosadṛṣaṃ piṇḍaṃ  #
analyzed: tathā hi kaḥ cit gavaya śabda artham a jānan kutas cit āraṇyaka puruṣāt go sadṛśaḥ gavayaḥ iti śrutvā vanam gataḥ vākya artham smaran go sadṛṣam piṇḍam
paśyati

original: tadanantaram asau gavayaśabdavācya ity upamitir utpadyte //
analyzed: tad anantaram asau gavaya śabda vācyaḥ iti upamitiḥ utpadyate
āpta vākyam śabdaḥ
āptaḥ tu yathārtha vaktā
vākyam pada samūhaḥ
yathā gām ānaya iti
śaktam padam

original: asmāt padād ayam artho boddhavya itīśvarasaṃketaḥ śaktiḥ //
analyzed: asmāt padāt ayam arthaḥ boddhavyaḥ iti īśvara saṃketaḥ śaktiḥ

original: AnTs_60 ākāṅkṣā yogyatā saṃnidhiś ca vākyārthajñānahetuḥ /
analyzed: ākāṅkṣā yogya tā saṃnidhiḥ ca vākya artha jñāna hetuḥ
artha ābādhaḥ yogyatā
padānām avilambena uccāraṇam saṃnidhiḥ
ākāṅkṣā ādi rahitam vākyam apramāṇam

original: yathā gaur aśvaḥ puruṣo hastīti na pramāṇam ākāṅkṣāvirahāt /
analyzed: yathā gauḥ aśvaḥ puruṣaḥ hastī iti na pramāṇam ākāṅkṣā virahāt

original: agninā siñced iti na pramāṇaṃ yogyatāvirahāt /
analyzed: agninā siñcet iti na pramāṇam yogya tā virahāt

original: prahare prehare'sahoccāritāni gām ānayetyādipadāni na pramāṇaṃ saṃnidhyabhāvāt //
analyzed: prahare prehare saha uccāritāni gām ānaya ityādi padāni na pramāṇam saṃnidhi abhāvāt
vākyam dvividham
vaidikam laukikam ca
vaidikam īśvara ukta tvāt sarvam eva pramāṇam
laukikam tu āpta uktam pramāṇam
anyat a pramāṇam
vākya artha jñānam śabda jñānam
tad karaṇam śabdaḥ
ekasmin dharmini viruddha nānā dharma vaiśiṣṭya avagāhi jñānam saṃśayaḥ
yathā sthāṇuḥ vā purṣaḥ vā iti
mithyā jñānam viparyayaḥ
yathā śuktau idam rajatam iti

original: vyāpyāropeṇa vyāpakāropas tarkaḥ yathā yadi vahnir na syāt tarhi dhūmo'pi na syād iti //
analyzed: vyāpya āropeṇa vyāpaka āropaḥ tarkaḥ yathā yadi vahniḥ na syāt tarhi dhūmaḥ api na syāt iti
smṛtiḥ api dvividhā
yathārthā ayathārthā ca pramā janyā yathārthā
apramā ajanyā ayathārthā
sarva īśām anukūla tayā vedanīyam sukham
sarva īśām pratikūla tayā vedanīyam duḥkham
icchā kāmaḥ
krodhaḥ dveṣaḥ
kṛtiḥ prayatnaḥ
vihita karma janyaḥ dharmaḥ
niṣiddha karma janyaḥ tu adharmaḥ
buddhi ādayaḥ aṣṭa ātma mātra viśeṣa guṇāḥ
buddhi icchā prayatnāḥ dvividhāḥ
nityāḥ anityāḥ ca
nityā īśvarasya
anityāḥ jīvasya
saṃskāraḥ trividhaḥ
vegaḥ bhāvanā sthiti sthāpakaḥ ca iti
vegaḥ pṛthivī ādi catuṣṭaya manaḥ vṛttiḥ
anubhava janyā smṛti hetuḥ bhāvanā ātma mātra vṛttiḥ

original: anyathā kṛtasya punas tadavasthāpādakaḥ sthitisthāpakaḥ kaṭādipṛthivīvṛttiḥ //
analyzed: anyathā kṛtasya punar tad avasthā āpādakaḥ sthiti sthāpakaḥ kaṭa ādi pṛthivī vṛttiḥ
calana ātmakam karma
ūrdhva deśa saṃyoga hetuḥ utkṣepaṇam
adhas deśa saṃyoga hetuḥ apakṣepaṇam
śarīra saṃnikṛṣṭa saṃyoga hetuḥ ākuñcanam
viprakṛṣṭa saṃyoga hetuḥ prasāraṇam
anyat sarvam gamanam
nityam ekam aneka anugatam sāmānyam
dravya guṇa karma vṛtti
tat dvividham para apara bhedāt
param sattā
aparam dravya tva ādiḥ
nitya saṃbandhaḥ samavāyaḥ

original: yayor dvayor madhya ekam avinaśyadaparāśritam evāvatiṣṭate tāv ayutasiddau /
analyzed: yayoḥ dvayoḥ madhye ekam a vinaśyat apara āśritam eva avatiṣṭate tau ayuta siddau

original: yathāvayavāvayavinau guṇaguṇinau kriyākriyāvantau jātivyaktī viśeṣanityadravye ceti //
analyzed: yathā avayava avayavinau guṇa guṇinau kriyā akriyāvantau jāti vyaktī viśeṣa nitya dravye ca iti
anādiḥ sa antaḥ prāgabhāvaḥ
utpatteḥ pūrvam kāryasya
sa ādiḥ anantaḥ pradhvaṃsaḥ
utpatti anantaram kāryasya
traikālika saṃsarga avacchinna pratiyogitāka utyanta abhāvaḥ
yathā bhū tale ghaṭaḥ na asti iti
tādātmya saṃbandha avacchinna pratiyogitākaḥ anyonyābhāvaḥ yathā ghaṭaḥ paṭaḥ na bhavati iti

original: AnTs_81 sarveṣāṃ padārthānāṃ yathāyatham ukteṣv antarbhāvāt saptaiva padārthā iti siddham //
analyzed: sarveṣām padārthānām yathāyatham ukteṣu antarbhāvāt sapta eva padārthāḥ iti siddham
